channel.title: Drawers Wanted Here (Minor-Advanced)
channel.description:
OK I made this guy (I SUCK AT DRAWING) its a top-down type character (runescape-like style) that's why you only see his hair I need a left or right sprite for him (I can flip) This sprite is Down so I need something like this, please post in this same size and save as .PNG (way better quality) if you can. (so can you like copy the image, and paint something like what I asked please)
EDIT: DOWN SPRITE [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/6emziv.png[/img]
Something like what im looking for except the legs straight like in my pic and stuff. [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/a0z62f.jpg[/img]
EDIT: Need a UP sprite too something that looks natural, the one above doesn't seem natural I tested.
